short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Goodreads extension that adds data export capability and displays extensive analytics about your reading habits.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Export entire library
- Compare reading rates between years
- Show insights about your favorite books
- Search your entire book library
